notes: Blue Riband, sold 1967, now a stationary hotel ship
sold to P&O 1961, renamed Remuera, scrapped 1969
built for White Star Line, scrapped 1960
built for White Star Line, scrapped 1956
Sold to the Black Sea Shipping Company, Soviet Union 1973
Sold to the Far Eastern Shipping Company, Soviet Union 1973, scrapped 2004
sold 2008, laid up in Port Rashid
